thread.title_full: Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian call off their divorce - SportingNews.com

title: Lamar Odom and Khloe Kardashian call off their divorce - SportingNews.com
text: By Travis Durkee Updated at 4:42 p.m. ET With Lamar Odom still hospitalized, he and Khloe Kardashian have decided to call off their divorce, according to court documents obtained by TMZ . According to the documents, Kardashian’s lawyer, Laura Wesser, filed paperwork Wednesday in Los Angeles Superior Court that had both her and Odom’s signatures asking to dismiss the divorce, which had yet to be finalized. MORE: Odom's NBA career, in photos | Why you can't dismiss Kardashian role in Odom's life Kardashian, who married Odom in 2009 before filing for divorce in 2013, reportedly has not left Odom’s side since he was found unconscious at a Las Vegas brothel last week and rushed to a hospital where he was immediately placed on life support. Odom began physical therapy earlier this week. Reports say cocaine was in his system along with an herbal substitute for Viagra when he was discovered in Las Vegas. Reports say he suffered a stroke that often occurs with a drug overdose.
